headline: PILGRIMAGE TO MT. VERNON; Flags of America, Britain and France Fly Above the Tomb. VIVIANI'S STIRRING WORDS Greets the Young Army of America Which Is "to Share Our Common Glory." headline: WANTS OUR FLAG AT FRONT; France Expects It Soon to be Unfurled on Battle Lines, Says Joffre. SUGGESTS UNIT AT A TIME. Hero of the Marne Advises Us Not to Wait to Train a Big Army Before Starting In. PREDICTS GREAT VICTORIES State Department Expurgates a Part of the French Marshal's Statement. Reads His Statement in French. Says Germany Dreads Us. Would Keep Americans There. Praises American Airmen. Looks to Women for Aid. ANXIOUS TO SEE OUR FLAG. French Say It Will Be a Blow to the Spirit of Kaiser's Army. Fear Transport Congestion. May Alter Our Plans. ITALIAN MISSION EN ROUTE. Baron des Planches, Ex-Ambassador to Washington, a Member.
